sentences.en: an idealistic young firebrand from the valleys
sentences.cn: 一个来自山沟沟、满脑子空想的年轻煽动分子

sentences.en: He is represented by the media as a dangerous firebrand .
sentences.cn: 新闻媒介报导，他是个危险的政治煽动者。

sentences.en: He is represented by the media as a dangerous firebrand.
sentences.cn: 新闻媒介报导,他是个危险的煽动者.

sentences.en: I was a block of wood, I became a firebrand.
sentences.cn: 我从前是块木头, 后来成了引火的干柴.

sentences.en: She has not hitherto been regarded by Washington insiders as a real firebrand, or heavy hitter.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止,她并未被华盛顿权威人士看作是真正具有号召力的领袖或重量级人物.

sentences.en: We kindled a firebrand in the cave.
sentences.cn: 我们在山洞里点燃火把.

trans.tran_cn: 火把，燃烧的木柴，放火者，煽动叛乱者
trans.tran_en: someone who tries to make people angry about a law, government etc so that they will try to change it
